title: dheena charaNyanE
sahitya:
dIna sharaNyanE dEvaki bAlanE tiruvaruL purivAyE





anupallavi

gAnavilOlanE kaustubha mAlanE kanakAmbaradhara vanamAlAdharanE





caraNam

shyAmala rUpane sarasija nEtranE sakala bhuvana paripAlanE

shIlanE



mAmaNi vaNNanE marakata kaNNanE mangaiyar manam kavar mAyanA AyanE
